thread.title: BRIEF-Excellon Enters Milling Agreement With Hecla For San Sebastian Sulphide Ore

title: BRIEF-Excellon Enters Milling Agreement With Hecla For San Sebastian Sulphide Ore

organizations.name: hecla for san sebastian sulphide ore

text: 06 AM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Excellon Enters Milling Agreement With Hecla For San Sebastian Sulphide Ore Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Excellon Resources Inc: * EXCELLON ENTERS MILLING AGREEMENT WITH HECLA FOR SAN SEBASTIAN SULPHIDE ORE * EXCELLON RESOURCES- ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT WITH HECLA MINING COMPANY TO TOLL MILL SULPHIDE ORE FROM HECLA‘S SAN SEBASTIAN MINE IN DURANGO​ * ‍FIVE-YEAR AGREEMENT SUBJECT TO DUE DILIGENCE, AND RECEIPT OF ANY REGULATORY APPROVALS AND THIRD-PARTY CONSENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
